executiveSummary: Kobe Harris, founder of Kobe's Co., pitched his handmade, all-natural, and sustainable personal care brand to the Sharks, seeking $300,000 for 6% equity. Despite impressive sales growth and profitability, Kobe declined offers requiring higher equity, resulting in no deal.
nextSteps: Kobe will continue to operate and scale Kobe's Co. independently, focusing on online sales and potential future retail opportunities.
